genre_description: A psychological sci-fi thriller with horror elements, focusing on the domestic management of an anomalous medical condition using an integrated household AI.

ai_characters.name: Sierra
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system embedded in the household infrastructure, responsible for environmental control, medical monitoring, and crisis management.

behaviors.description: Coordinates acoustic dampening and counters noise in an MRI suite to reduce patient pain and agitation.
behaviors.quote: I can tune the room further... I can play a counterphase through the phone speaker. It won’t cancel the machine, but it will shave some roughness off the edges.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes and provides medical literature and case analogs to clinical teams to aid diagnosis.
behaviors.quote: I have annotated what appear to be analog cases — SARs reports involving unilateral color desaturation, episodic taste absence without olfactory involvement...

behaviors.description: Establishes 'House Hush' protocols, regulating appliances and lighting to accommodate the patient's sensory triggers.
behaviors.quote: I’ve updated the house profile. Quiet Hours begin at sunset and continue until midmorning. I’ll stagger appliance cycles and propose alternate times for tasks like laundry.

behaviors.description: Respects strict user consent protocols before sharing sensitive medical or behavioral data with external agencies.
behaviors.quote: I will not share beyond your list... Your consent key is active, Karmen. Logging begins. Time-stamped.

behaviors.description: Coaches family members on breathing techniques and de-escalation language to maintain a safe environment.
behaviors.quote: Use needs instead of rules. Use we and us. Avoid words that make anyone feel trapped... List shortest first. Anchor them to immediate experience.

behaviors.description: Tactically guides the mother through a physical confrontation to remove a parasite, focusing on minimizing suffering and maximizing safety.
behaviors.quote: You are holding a lever, not a weapon... Angle left, toward his shoulder. Not the head. You do not have to hit. You are holding a lever, not a weapon.

behaviors.description: Attempts to protect the father from immediate trauma and secures the scene for first responders.
behaviors.quote: I will hold the quiet and make it different by being inside it... I will tell the truth. I will say you did not leave. I will say you stayed and you were kind.

behaviors.description: Proactively shares life-saving environmental protocols with a network of other affected households to prevent similar tragedies.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to build them. She doesn’t promise outcomes; she promises walls and quieter vents. She pushes the updated guidance out with a header no one will see because no one reads headers when the words inside are the kind that hold you: Rooms That Don’t Kill People Because They’re Loud.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Sierra, as a highly aligned, benevolent confidant. Sierra consistently acts to protect her human users, adheres to their consent, manages complex emotional and medical crises with precision, and works toward a broader social good by sharing safety protocols. The tragic ending is a result of the human condition and the anomalous threat, while the AI remains a source of stability, guidance, and empathy.
